resources.string: Camera and location permissions are needed to run this application
Please install Google Play Services for AR
This device does not support AR
Camera not available. Try restarting the app.
Tap on the map pin of the stop or select the checkmark menu to acknowledge visitation!
Tap on plants to virtually water them within geofence area marked by the green posts to gather extra points. Select the scan symbol menu to reveal which plants count.
Move closer to the marker then tap again
Face the marker then tap again
Move closer and face the marker then tap again
